arts.ttl: Shakhtar keep Champions League hopes alive with win over Brest
arts.sum: Goals from Kevin and Heorhiy Sudakov help Shakhtar Donetsk to a 2-0 victory over Brest to keep the Ukrainian side in contention for a place in the Champions League play-offs.

arts.ttl: Vinicius Jr’s Real Madrid ban extended amid Saudi interest
arts.sum: This card marks his third in the Champions League, meaning he will miss the final group stage match against Brest. Consequently, he will miss the next two games: Real Valladolid in LaLiga and Brest in the Champions League .

arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid will be forced to make do without star attacker Vinícius Jr. in the club’s next outing on the continent. This comes owing to developments in…

arts.ttl: Shakhtar beats Brest to stay in Champions League contention. Sporting Lisbon loses at Leipzig
arts.sum: The French club was 11th at the final whistle with 13 points and could yet qualify direct for the round of 16 with a top-eight finish, though it plays defending champion Real Madrid next Wednesday. Shakhtar now has seven points from seven games, one below the current tally of Manchester City in 24th place before seven games are played later Wednesday.
